formdata.description: format = [2,null,3]   pass null iff product has no variant

OPTCRDC - Credit Card
OPTDBCRD - Debit Card
OPTNBK - Net Banking
OPTCASHC - Cash Card
OPTMOBP - Mobile Payments
OPTCHKOT - Checkout
OPTUPI - Unified Payments

Type of card used by the customer.
CRDC - Credit Card
DBCRD - Debit Card
NBK - Net Banking
CASHC - Cash Card
MOBP - Mobile Payments
CHKOT - Checkout
UPI - Unified Payments
Mobile no (Only in case of Mobile payments.)
Mobile Money Identification Number (MMID) is a seven digit number for the bank offering IMPS.
One Time Password to complete an IMPS transaction

Virtual payment address (VPA) is a user-generated unique identifier for each bank account. All payment addresses are in the format abc @bank, where abc can be chosen by the customer. (Only in case of UPI)
